title: Red Reality Painting
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:the-foundation-theme |dark=--]]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include component:image-block
| name=redreality.png
| caption=A hand painted recreation of SCP-3001 using spray paint and acrylic
| width=700px
| align=center]]

[[=]]
While a relatively old painting of mine, it's the first not only SCP painting I had created, but my first painting on canvas entirely. It holds a special place in my heart given the physical copy no longer exists, so it feels fitting for it to have its place on the wiki for others to enjoy. With SCP-3001 being a favorite of mine, it felt nice to create it and start my exploration of multi-media paintings. 
[[/=]]
